english: It's a great favor to see me worthy.

text: Candar Bey, bu bir lütuf değil
english: Mr. Candar, it's not a blessing.

text: Bu, devletin bekası için almak zaruriyetinde olduğum bir tedbir
english: It's a precaution I'm obliged to take for the state's sake.

text: Bu itin kuyruğuna kim bastı kardeş?
english: Who stepped on this dog's tail, bro?

text: Hiç hayırlı bir haber getirmişe benzemez
english: It's not like he's bringing good news.

text: Beyimizi de pusatsız gönderdik iblislerin yanına
english: We've sent our master to the devil's side.
Let's get on with it.

text: Tekfur Hazretleri, izninizle Komutan Vasilius'a acil bir pusula geldi
english: Your Highness, if you'll excuse me, Commander Vasilius has received an urgent compass.

text: Ertuğrul'un tekfuru ziyareti, ona hiçbir fayda sağlayamayacak inşallah
english: Ertugrul's visit won't do him any good, I hope.

text: Hatta o kaleden sağ çıkması ihtimal dahilinde bile değil
english: In fact, there's no way he's gonna make it out of that castle alive.
Tomorrow, probably.
This jihan will change.
But let's keep our guard up.

text: Gayrı döşeğimde rahat bir uyku bana haramdır, bilirim
english: I know it's forbidden for me to sleep comfortably on my separate bed.

text: Onların o uğursuz kalelerinin burçlarında cesetleri sallanana kadar
english: Until their bodies were shaken in the constellations of their evil castles.
Ural killed sleep, Your Highness.

text: Kefere karşısında Allah bileğine kuvvet versin Ural
english: May God strengthen your wrist against the shroud, Ural.
By the way,
I just found out that you've recently lost your wife.
I'm sorry for your loss.
Thank you, friends.

text: Az evvel burada uzunca bir vakit kalacağınızı söylediniz
english: You just said you'd be here for a long time.

text: Kim bilir bekli de bir Türkmen beyinin kızıyla hayırlı bir nikâh kıyarsınız
english: Who knows if you'll marry the daughter of a Turkmen brain
Well, they say there's a good thing at weddings.

text: Böyle bir nikâh, devletimize karşı Türkmenleri de kenetleyecektir
english: Such a wedding will also bind Turkmen against our state

text: Toyda büyük bir ustanın elinden almıştım bunu Emir Hazretleri
english: Toyda, I took it from a great master, Your Highness.
I hope you appreciate it on your back.
Thank you, Mr. Candar.
Thanks.
We found the bandit and paid for it.

text: Mağdur olan tüccarların da zararını bizzat ben karşıladım
english: I personally took care of the losses of the fallen merchants.
Believe not in what you hear, but in what you see.

text: Eğer tüccarla konuşmuş olsaydınız her şeyi daha iyi anlardınız
english: If you'd talked to the merchant, you'd understand everything better.
Trust?

text: Bir de bizden itimat beklersin ha?
english: And you expect us to trust you?
You degenerate murderer.
I won't let you out of here alive.
You're gonna pay for this.
What are you talking about, Vasilius?

text: İmparatorun mabeyincisi, yolda Kayıların saldırısına uğramış efendim
english: The Emperor's master was attacked on the way, sir.
What?
What's going on, Brother Dogan?

text: Belli ki ulak, fitnenin fitilini ateşledi kardeşler
english: The messenger obviously lit the fuse of the trial, brothers.
My Mr. Ertugrul is in there with no pusat
What are we gonna do?

text: Beyimizi yalnız da, pusatsız da koymayacağız
english: We're not going to put our master alone or without a beat.
They killed the Emperor's master. Get them!
Come on, God!

text: Kardeşler, buradan sağ çıkamazsak hakkınızı helal edin
english: Brothers, if we don't get out of here alive, give us your blessing.
Way to go, Brother Born
We're not dead yet, brother.
We've survived worse.
We'll get out of this, God willing.
I'm very, very sorry, sir.

text: Kayıların baskınında kızınız Helena da varmış
english: Your daughter Helena was in the raid on the apricots.
He's coming to the castle.
My daughter!
Apricots don't fly without me knowing

text: Belli ki birileri bizi karşı karşıya getirmek ister
english: Obviously, someone wants to bring us face-to-face.
Let me kill him, sir.

text: Seni kendi ellerimle geberteceğim Uğursuz Türk!
english: I'll kill you myself, you evil Turk!
